Draft Rating:

C-

Ernie Grunfeld ranks in the 41th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Grunfeld's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 4 spots lower than they were picked due to their terrible drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Michael Redd with 43th pick but was worth 1th pick.
  • Drafted Charlie Ward with 26th pick but was worth 4th pick.
  • Drafted Dominic McGuire with 47th pick but was worth 32th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted John Wall with 1th pick but was worth 2th pick.
  • Drafted Jan Veselý with 6th pick but was worth 35th pick.
  • Drafted Nick Young with 16th pick but was worth 47th pick.

Trade Rating:

D

Ernie Grunfeld ranks in the 29th percentile for trading among executives in our database.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Marcus Camby to NYK.
  • Lost Sean Marks, Charles Oakley to TOR.
Their biggest L:
  • Added Desmond Mason, Gary Payton to MIL.
  • Lost Ray Allen, Ronald Murray, Kevin Ollie, Luke Ridnour to SEA.

Signing Rating:

C

Ernie Grunfeld ranks in the 48th percentile for free agency signings among executives in our database. That's basically average. It could be worse though lol.
Their best signings:
  • Signed Gilbert Arenas in 2003.
  • Signed Anthony Mason in 1991.
  • Signed Otto Porter in 2017.
Their worst signings:
  • Signed Kelly Oubre Jr. in 2015.
  • Signed DeShawn Stevenson in 2006.
  • Signed Ian Mahinmi in 2016.
